description: add a context feature / route which allows users to upload files or images or text which will persist to .automaker/context. there should be a left panel with all context files and a text editor or image previewer that lets users view edit delete the context.  include the context in every single coding prompt or improve the coding_prompt.md to have a phase where it loads in that context
When I archived a session I had selected, I'd expect it to unselect it
steps: 4. expect empty state placeholder in right panel

description: Remove analysis link and related code, it's not useful
when clicking a value in the typeahead, there is a bug where it does not close automatically, fix this
show a error toast when concurrency limit is hit and someone tries to drag a card into in progress to give them feedback why it won't work.
Add a way to force stop an agent on a card which is currently running
Remove drag icon from cards when in in progress or verified.  also add a timer that tracks how long it has been since the agent started, a count up timer basically formatted 00:00
add a count up timer for showing how long the card has been in progress
When the agent is marked as verified, remove their context file

Add Context File should show a file name and a textarea for the context info, that text area should allow drag n drop for txt files and .md files which the system will parse and put into the text area
Ability to delete in progress cards which will auto stop their agents on delete
Make in progress column  double width so that the cards display 2 columns masonry layout
When the electron ui refreshes, it often redirects me back to the overview, remeber my last route and restore on app load
